General.Name: Asia Cuanon Tech (Shanghai)
General.Description: Asia Cuanon Technology (Shanghai) Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells functional architectural coatings, decorated insulation panels, thermal insulation materials, and floor coatings. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yongjun  Wang
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
